ee:transform.doc:name: convert dates from Long to String

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 import update from dw::util::Values output application/json --- payload update "created_date" with (payload.created_date as Number as DateTime {format: "dd-MM-yyyy"}) update "birth_date" with (payload.birth_date as Number as DateTime {format: "dd-MM-yyyy"})

%dw 2.0 var arr = ["billing_street","billing_city","billing_state","billing_country","billing_postal_code"] import * from dw::util::Values output application/json --- (payload map ({ ($), "billing_address": $.billing_street ++ "," ++ $.billing_city ++ "," ++ $.billing_state ++ "," ++ $.billing_postal_code ++ "," ++ $.billing_country } filterObject !(arr contains ($$ as String))))
